oai_dc:dc.dc:title: FPGA implementation of a single-precision floating-point multiply-accumulator with single-cycle accumulation
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: PAIDIMARRI, A
CEVRERO, A
BRISK, P
IENNE, P
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This paper describes an FPGA implementation of a single-precision floating-point multiply-accumulator (FPMAC) that supports single-cycle accumulation while maintaining high clock frequencies. A non-traditional internal representation reduces the cost of mantissa alignment within the accumulator. The FPMAC is evaluated on an Altera Stratix III FPGA.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: PROCEEDINGS OF THE 2009 17TH IEEE SYMPOSIUM ON FIELD PROGRAMMABLE CUSTOM COMPUTING MACHINES,267-270
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: 17th Annual IEEE Symposium on Field Programmable Custom Computing Machines,Napa, CA,APR 05-07, 2009
